predictions.text: We do not track you on this site or any others, and we do not pass your data to any third party

predictions.text: Our web server does not store your IP address or any other personally identifiable information that is not provided by you

predictions.text: We don't use any external contractors to build or maintain this website, but in the event we ever do they will not have access to your private data

predictions.text: You can unsubscribe from these at any time using the link at the end of any email
